Name: Durka Simulator
About the game: Durka Simulator is a visual novel where you are waiting for adventure and mystery. You as the main player are being sought to take away your power. You and mysterious must not let them catch you! With you will always be your friends as a lemur named Zina, Mysterious and Larry Your task is not to let the orderlies catch you! You will be able to beat them? Do not forget that the game has many endings your choice can lead to the wrong position
